name: .ARF File Extension
summary: Learn about .ARF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An ARF file contains a recording of an online meeting downloaded from WebEx. It is recorded using Network-Based Recording (NBR) and stores the video data, a table of contents, an attendee list, and other information on separate panels.

content: ARF recordings can be converted to Windows Media (.WMV) or Flash (.SWF) files using the free WebEx ARF Player.
NOTE: ARF files are WebEx recordings downloaded by the user, while .WRF files are WebEx sessions recorded directly by the user.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
